title: Kindness starts with you
description: This was my group project during the storytelling module of HyperIsland Motion Creative program.

title: Spotify Loop Animation
description: This was an individual project during the HyperIsland Motion Creative program. I had to create an abstract loop animation for spotify canvas.

title: Walk Cycle Animation Loop
description: This was an individual project during the HyperIsland Motion Creative program. I had to create a gif animation for a walk cycle.

title: Frog animation loop
description: This was an individual project during the HyperIsland Motion Creative program. This was my first animation assignment.

title: Hair animation tutorial
description: As a part of a learning module during the HyperIsland Motion Creative program, I had to conduct a workshop on hair movement animation using frame-by-frame technique in Adobe Photoshop vs Adobe After-effects.

title: Dog jump animation
description: This was an individual project during the HyperIsland Motion Creative program. I had to create a dog skipping animation for an online kids' book.
